attributes.action: Take Legal action against Gove and Johnson for lying to the Public about Brexit
attributes.additional_details:
Quote from the vote leave campaign

We should negotiate a new UK-EU deal based on free trade and friendly cooperation. We end the supremacy of EU law. We regain control. We stop sending £350 million every week to Brussels and instead spend it on our priorities, like the NHS and science research. Lie


A vote to 'leave' and a better, friendlier relationship with the EU is much safer than giving Brussels more power and money every year.
Lie
attributes.background: Michael Gove and Boris Johnson said that the money to the EU would be spent on the NHS, they have said this won't happen. They said that the Remain campaign were scare mongering about the economy, the economy will suffer. Mr Johnson denies the campaign was about immigrants when it clearly was.

rejection.details: The Crown Prosecution Service is responsible for bringing charges in England and Wales. It is independent of Government and Parliament.
